column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Roasted Bone Marrow - (with caramelized onion jam
column2: parsley salad) It looks like they give you soooo many. If you're going to get this
column3: you should definitely share and don't eat the warm bread and butter they give you. Comes with 3 pieces of toasted sourdough and 5 bones (though really only 2 of them really have substance. The bottom 3 bones are fairly shallow
column4: but it's plenty of bone marrow nonetheless
column5: so well worth the price point. On a side note
column6: it'll fill you up. I wasn't a fan of the jam as it was a bit on the sweet side for me
column7: and the marrow could've used a sprinkle of salt flakes.
